Crimes.Grounds_for_Claim: Alleged complicity in crimes against humanity through service in Colombian navy

Crimes.Evidence_Requirement: Evidence of widespread, systematic human rights abuses by the organization

Crimes.Personal_Data_Implicated: Military service record, knowledge of atrocities
Crimes.Complaint_Issues: Unfair exclusion from refugee protection based on insufficient evidence
Crimes.Protection_Claim: Refugee protection under the Refugee Convention
Crimes.State_Protection_Assessment: Colombia's ability to protect individuals from persecution
Crimes.Risk_Factor: Persecution due to association with state forces
Crimes.Credibility: Not directly challenged; focus on sufficiency of evidence against organization
Crimes.State_Protection_Adequacy: Assumed inadequate, but issue was exclusion due to alleged complicity
Crimes.Risk_Nature: Risk of harm due to past involvement with state actor
